channel.title: Need help (read plz)
channel.description:
Hey how are you? I need help with my server! How do i make a new home? What i mean is on the spell book you see the "Home icon" how do i make that teleport you somewere?
~Asdblopss :D

item.title: Need help (read plz)
item.dc:creator: @oniscape oniscape
item.description:
@oniscape wrote:

[quote=“b15, post:5, topic:359318”]ok this is an easy one.first you need to change the home location in a few files.

  1. in your server go to home and type ::mypos so you can see exactly where your x and y for your home is. lets just use x3087 and y3492 for an example.

  2. open players.java (this changes where new players start at) and hit CTR and F and search for “3087” or what ever location you got at your home by typing ::mypos.
    you will come across something like this…
    toX = 3087;
    toY = 3492;
    now change thoes numbers to your new location.

  3. open client.java (This changes where a player goes when they type ::home) and hit CTR and F and search for " “home” " please include the inside quotations. you will get something that looks like below…
    if(command.startsWith(“home”)){
    triggerTele(3092, 3492, 0);
    brightness = 4;
    }

again change the 3092 and the 3492 to your new location. DO NOT CHANGE THE 0!

  1. go into clicking.java (this changes when they click on a tele in magic book, quest tab, music tab or where ever you have the buttons to tele to home) and again hit CTR and F and search for “3087” or what ever your original home location is.

you will see something that looks like this.

c.triggerTele(3087, 3493, 0);

again change the numbers DO NOT CHANGE THE 0!

Hope you learned something and have a fun time with your new home![/quote]

Good, but thats spoon feeding and is against the rules. But he will learn

Read full topic

item.title: Need help (read plz)
item.dc:creator: @b15 b15
item.description:
@b15 wrote:

ok this is an easy one.first you need to change the home location in a few files.

  1. in your server go to home and type ::mypos so you can see exactly where your x and y for your home is. lets just use x3087 and y3492 for an example.

  2. open players.java (this changes where new players start at) and hit CTR and F and search for “3087” or what ever location you got at your home by typing ::mypos.
    you will come across something like this…
    toX = 3087;
    toY = 3492;
    now change thoes numbers to your new location.

  3. open client.java (This changes where a player goes when they type ::home) and hit CTR and F and search for " “home” " please include the inside quotations. you will get something that looks like below…
    if(command.startsWith(“home”)){
    triggerTele(3092, 3492, 0);
    brightness = 4;
    }

again change the 3092 and the 3492 to your new location. DO NOT CHANGE THE 0!

  1. go into clicking.java (this changes when they click on a tele in magic book, quest tab, music tab or where ever you have the buttons to tele to home) and again hit CTR and F and search for “3087” or what ever your original home location is.

you will see something that looks like this.

c.triggerTele(3087, 3493, 0);

again change the numbers DO NOT CHANGE THE 0!

Hope you learned something and have a fun time with your new home!

Read full topic

item.title: Need help (read plz)
item.dc:creator: @oniscape oniscape
item.description:
@oniscape wrote:

CTRL + F. Windows also has a search feature.

Simply go to the current coordinates of the current home, type ::mypos, find where those are in the coding, replace them with your home, and your good. Wasn’t so hard?

Read full topic
